item.title: Amtrak launches faster, updated Acela train service as Trump admin takes DC Union Station control
item.description: NextGen Acela train service offers premium travel with free Wi-Fi, USB ports and 27% more seats on the Washington-New York-Boston corridor.

item.title: Trump fired Fed Governor Lisa Cook over alleged mortgage fraud: What did she do?
item.description: Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook is facing mortgage fraud allegations raised by Trump official Bill Pulte and vowed a legal challenge against Presid...

item.title: GM recalls more than 23,000 Corvettes over fuel leak issue linked to fires
item.description: General Motors has recalled more than 23,000 Chevrolet Corvettes in response to a fuel leak issue connected to multiple reported fires.

item.title: Trump imposes additional 25% tariffs on India tied to Russian oil purchases
item.description: Trump imposes 25% tariff on India imports over Russian oil purchases, pushing some duties to 50% as retaliation for New Delhi's discounted crude impor...

item.title: Southwest rolls out new conditions for plus-size passenger refunds
item.description: Plus-size travelers must buy extra seats on Southwest flights with assigned seating, with refunds only available if flights depart with open seats.
